summary: This is an email from attorney Laura A. Menninger to Nicole Lundberg regarding a supplemental letter about anticipated testimony related to Mr. Epstein. It appears to be legal correspondence from defense counsel discussing preparation for testimony.

persons.name: Laura A. Menninger
persons.context: Attorney at Haddon, Morgan & Foreman, P.C. who sent an email with a supplemental letter regarding anticipated testimony related to Mr. Epstein.

persons.name: Nicole Lundberg
persons.context: Recipient of an email from Laura Menninger regarding supplemental testimony letter.

connections.description: Menninger sent legal correspondence to Lundberg regarding testimony matters.

events.title: Supplemental Testimony Letter Sent
events.description: Laura Menninger sent an email with attached supplemental letter regarding anticipated testimony related to Mr. Epstein.

keyFacts: Laura A. Menninger of Haddon, Morgan & Foreman, P.C. was involved in legal matters related to Epstein testimony as of November 2021.
The correspondence discusses 'anticipated testimony' regarding Mr. Epstein, suggesting ongoing legal proceedings or preparations.
The email was sent from Laura Menninger to Nicole Lundberg with an attachment described as a 'supplemental letter'.
